SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, SECESSION_FL, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE
FROM MEMBER
WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, SECESSION_FL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = ?, MEMBER_TEL = ?,
WHERE GRADE_CODE = 99
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE GRADE_CODE = 99 AND MEMBER_PW = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, SECESSION_FL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, REG_DATE, SECESSION_FL FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ?
